name: Boundary Disk Summary
description: Scans the given device or drive and reports the percent of disk used and various disk metrics

paramSchema.title: Mount Point
paramSchema.name: dir
paramSchema.description: The mounted point (on Linux) to check for free space and other metrics. (either this or the Mounted device need to be set for the plugin to function properly). NOTE: Leave empty on Windows.

paramSchema.title: Device/Drive
paramSchema.name: device
paramSchema.description: The mounted device (on Linux) or drive (on Windows)to check for free space and other metrics. (either this or the Mount Point directory need to be set for the plugin to function properly)

paramSchema.title: Source
paramSchema.name: diskname
paramSchema.description: Some alias to be appended to the hostname to display in the legend for the data.
